After the spell check is finished, I should not have to hit the send button.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.  Compose a new e-mail message.
2.  The spell check will open up if there any misspelled words.
3.  After going through all of the misspelled words, I have to hit send on the spell check dialog.  Since I already hit send to bring up the spell check, I should not have to hit send again.
